ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:29:00 [Issue ID 4000-744564] urn:comicvine:4000-744564 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:35:56. [Issue ID 2100176]
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s Belle vs CHIP as Belle has become public enemy number one to the cryptid hunting organization. Everything is on the line here. Lives will be lost and everything Belle’s come to know as her life will change forever. Don’t miss this last chapter of Belle: Oath of Thorns!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Caanan White & Mohan Sivakami | 2 | C | Cover C | Sun Khamunaki | 3 | D | Cover D | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Show Exclusive Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Classic Fairy Tale Collectible Cover 3 of 4, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | Note: The digital edition (4/1/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
